channel.title: icing on dalton newbend
channel.description: Recent content in icing on dalton newbend

item.description: ingredients 100g confectioners sugar 1 tbs milk 1/2 tsp vanilla -------------------------- *optionals* 1 tbs milk (unflavored) 1 tbs lemon juice (lemon flavor) 25g cocao powder (chocolate) instructions mix all ingredients together thoroughly, keep chilled try flavoring with orange juice, mulled zest, mulled fruit, melted chocolate, instant or brewed coffee & more!
